query: Could you generate a 3-day travel plan for 2 people, traveling from San Francisco to Dallas between March 15th and March 17th, 2022? Our budget is set at $2,200. We require accommodations that allow smoking and we would prefer entire rooms. We will not be self-driving during our stay.
